001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Grade;
006import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
007import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student;
008import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
009
010import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
011import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
012import java.io.IOException;
013import java.time.LocalDateTime;
014import java.util.HashMap;
015import java.util.zip.ZipEntry;
016import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream;
017import java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream;
018
019import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Submit.ManifestAttributes;
020import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Submit.ManifestAttributes.*;
021import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
022import static org.hamcrest.core.IsEqual.equalTo;
023import static org.hamcrest.core.IsNull.notNullValue;
024import static org.hamcrest.core.IsNull.nullValue;
025
026public class AndroidZipFixerTest {
027
028  @Test
029  public void unitTestEntriesAreIgnored() {
030    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("src/test/java"), equalTo(null));
031  }
032
033  @Test
034  public void androidTestEntriesAreIgnored() {
035    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("src/androidTest/java"), equalTo(null));
036  }
037
038  @Test
039  public void androidTestInDirectoryIsIgnored() {
040    String entry = "student/app/src/androidTest/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/";
041    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(null));
042  }
043
044  @Test
045  public void buildDirectoriesAreIgnored() {
046    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("build"), equalTo(null));
047  }
048
049  @Test
050  public void buildGradleRemainsAtTopLevel() {
051    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("build.gradle"), equalTo("build.gradle"));
052  }
053
054  @Test
055  public void buildGradleInAppDirectoryRemainsInItsDirectory() {
056    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("app/build.gradle"), equalTo("app/build.gradle"));
057  }
058
059  @Test
060  public void buildGradleInNonAppDirectoryIsMoveToTop() {
061    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/build.gradle"), equalTo("build.gradle"));
062  }
063
064  @Test
065  public void buildGradleInAppDirectoryInOtherDirectoryIsMovedToTopAppDirectory() {
066    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/app/build.gradle"), equalTo("app/build.gradle"));
067  }
068
069  @Test
070  public void gradlePropertiesRemainsAtTopLevel() {
071    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("gradle.properties"), equalTo("gradle.properties"));
072  }
073
074  @Test
075  public void gradlePropertiesMovedToTopLevel() {
076    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/gradle.properties"), equalTo("gradle.properties"));
077  }
078
079  @Test
080  public void gradleDirectoryMovedToTopLevel() {
081    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/gradle"), equalTo("gradle"));
082  }
083
084  @Test
085  public void gradlewScriptMovedToTopLevel() {
086    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/gradlew"), equalTo("gradlew"));
087  }
088
089  @Test
090  public void settingsDotGradleScriptMovedToTopLevel() {
091    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/settings.gradle"), equalTo("settings.gradle"));
092  }
093
094  @Test
095  public void localDotPropertiesIsIgnored() {
096    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("fred/local.properties"), equalTo(null));
097  }
098
099  @Test
100  public void gradleWrapperJarFileMovedToTopLevel() {
101    String entry = "gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar";
102    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("student/" + entry), equalTo(entry));
103  }
104
105  @Test
106  public void gradlewDotBatIsIgnored() {
107    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("student/gradlew.bat"), equalTo(null));
108  }
109
110  @Test
111  public void javaSourceRemainsAtTopLevel() {
112    String entry = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/MainActivity.java";
113    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(entry));
114  }
115
116  @Test
117  public void javaSourceIsMovedToTopLevel() {
118    String entry = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/MainActivity.java";
119    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("directory/" + entry), equalTo(entry));
120  }
121
122  @Test
123  public void ideaDirectoryIsIgnored() {
124    String entry = "5Proj/apptbook-gwt/.idea/artifacts/";
125    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(null));
126  }
127
128  @Test
129  public void imlFilesAreIgnored() {
130    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName("project.iml"), equalTo(null));
131  }
132
133  @Test
134  public void resourcesDirectoryIsMovedToTopLevel() {
135    String resource = "app/src/main/res/mipmap-mdpi/ic_launcher.png";
136    String entry = "5Proj/apptbook-gwt" + resource;
137    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(resource));
138  }
139
140  @Test
141  public void srcIsAddedToMainDirectory() {
142    String entry = "main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/PrettyPrinter.java";
143    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo("app/src/" + entry));
144  }
145
146  @Test
147  public void macosDirectoryIsIgnored() {
148    String entry = "__MACOSX/apptbook-gwt/._pom.xml";
149    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(null));
150  }
151  @Test
152  public void mainThatIsNotSourceMainIsIgnored() {
153    String entry = "apptbook-gwt/out/production/main/";
154    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(null));
155  }
156
157  @Test
158  public void directoryWithJavaIsMovedToSrcMain() {
159    String entry = "student/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/Appointment.java";
160    String fixed = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/Appointment.java";
161    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(fixed));
162  }
163
164  @Test
165  public void srcTestIsIgnored() {
166    String entry = "apptbook-gwt-submission/src/test/java/edu/";
167    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(null));
168  }
169
170  @Test
171  public void srcAndroidTestIsIgnored() {
172    String entry = "apptbook-gwt-submission/src/androidTest/java/edu/";
173    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(null));
174  }
175
176  @Test
177  public void directoryWithJavaSubPackageNamedDomainIsMovedToSrcMain() {
178    String entry = "student/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/domain/Appointment.java";
179    String fixed = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/domain/Appointment.java";
180    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(fixed));
181  }
182
183  @Test
184  public void directoryWithJavaSubPackageNamedDomainRemainsInSrcMain() {
185    String entry = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/domain/Appointment.java";
186    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(entry));
187  }
188
189  @Test
190  public void fileSubmittedWithSubmitProgramIsMovedToSrcMainJava() {
191    String entry = "edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/domain/Appointment.java";
192    String fixed = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/client/domain/Appointment.java";
193    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(fixed));
194  }
195
196  @Test
197  public void packageWithMainIsMovedToAppropriateLocation() {
198    String entry = "AndroidAppointmentBook/app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410j/student/androidappointmentbook/ui/main/SectionsPagerAdapter.java";
199    String fixed = "app/src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410j/student/androidappointmentbook/ui/main/SectionsPagerAdapter.java";
200    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), equalTo(fixed));
201  }
202
203  @Test
204  public void pomFileInTargetIsIgnored() {
205    String entry = "airline-gwt/target/airline/META-INF/maven/edu.pdx.cs410J.student/airline-gwt/pom.xml";
206    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), nullValue());
207  }
208
209  @Test
210  public void dsStoreIsIgnored() {
211    String entry = "student/airline/src/main/.DS_Store";
212    assertThat(AndroidZipFixer.getFixedEntryName(entry), nullValue());
213  }
214
215  @Test
216  public void manifestContainsStudentId() {
217    String studentId = "studentId";
218
219    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
220    book.addStudent(new Student(studentId));
221
222    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(book);
223    assertThat(fixer.getManifestEntriesForStudent(studentId).get(USER_ID), equalTo(studentId));
224  }
225
226  @Test
227  public void manifestContainsStudentName() {
228
229    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
230    Student student = new Student("studentId");
231    student.setFirstName("First");
232    student.setLastName("Last");
233    book.addStudent(student);
234
235    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(book);
236    assertThat(fixer.getManifestEntriesForStudent("studentId").get(USER_NAME), equalTo(student.getFullName()));
237
238  }
239
240  @Test
241  public void manifestContainsSubmissionTime() {
242    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
243    String studentId = "studentId";
244    Student student = new Student(studentId);
245    book.addStudent(student);
246
247    Assignment gwtProject = new Assignment("Project5", 12.0);
248    book.addAssignment(gwtProject);
249
250    Grade grade = new Grade(gwtProject, Grade.NO_GRADE);
251    LocalDateTime submissionTime = LocalDateTime.now();
252    grade.noteSubmission(submissionTime);
253
254    student.setGrade(gwtProject, grade);
255
256    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(book);
257    assertThat(fixer.getManifestEntriesForStudent(studentId).get(SUBMISSION_TIME), equalTo(ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(submissionTime)));
258  }
259
260  @Test
261  public void manifestContainsLatestSubmissionTime() {
262    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
263    String studentId = "studentId";
264    Student student = new Student(studentId);
265    book.addStudent(student);
266
267    Assignment gwtProject = new Assignment("Project5", 12.0);
268    book.addAssignment(gwtProject);
269
270    Grade grade = new Grade(gwtProject, Grade.NO_GRADE);
271    LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();
272    LocalDateTime firstSubmissionTime = now.minusDays(1);
273    grade.noteSubmission(firstSubmissionTime);
274    LocalDateTime secondSubmissionTime = now.minusHours(6);
275    grade.noteSubmission(secondSubmissionTime);
276
277    student.setGrade(gwtProject, grade);
278
279    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(book);
280    assertThat(fixer.getManifestEntriesForStudent(studentId).get(SUBMISSION_TIME), equalTo(ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(secondSubmissionTime)));
281  }
282
283  @Test
284  public void missingSubmissionDateResultsInNullManifestEntry() {
285    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
286    String studentId = "studentId";
287    Student student = new Student(studentId);
288    book.addStudent(student);
289
290    Assignment gwtProject = new Assignment("Project5", 12.0);
291    book.addAssignment(gwtProject);
292
293    Grade grade = new Grade(gwtProject, Grade.NO_GRADE);
294
295    student.setGrade(gwtProject, grade);
296
297    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(book);
298    assertThat(fixer.getManifestEntriesForStudent(studentId).get(SUBMISSION_TIME), equalTo(null));
299  }
300
301  @Test
302  public void contentsOfZipEntriesAreNotModified() throws IOException {
303    String entryName = "build.gradle";
304    String entryContent = "This is a test entry";
305
306    ByteArrayOutputStream zippedBytes = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
307    ZipOutputStream zos = new ZipOutputStream(zippedBytes);
308    zos.setMethod(ZipOutputStream.DEFLATED);
309
310    ZipEntry entry = new ZipEntry(entryName);
311    zos.putNextEntry(entry);
312    zos.write(entryContent.getBytes());
313    zos.closeEntry();
314    zos.close();
315
316    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(new GradeBook("test"));
317    ByteArrayOutputStream fixedBytes = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
318    fixer.fixZipFile(new ByteArrayInputStream(zippedBytes.toByteArray()), fixedBytes, new HashMap<>());
319
320    ZipInputStream zis = new ZipInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(fixedBytes.toByteArray()));
321
322    ZipEntry fixedEntry = zis.getNextEntry();
323    while (fixedEntry != null) {
324      if (fixedEntry.getName().equals(entryName)) {
325        break;
326      }
327      fixedEntry = zis.getNextEntry();
328    }
329
330    assertThat(fixedEntry, notNullValue());
331
332    ByteArrayOutputStream fixedEntryBytes = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
333    ByteStreams.copy(zis, fixedEntryBytes);
334    String fixedEntryContent = new String(fixedEntryBytes.toByteArray());
335
336    assertThat(fixedEntryContent, equalTo(entryContent));
337
338
339  }
340
341}
